data.text: “Abrabɔ afono me;
Mɛka akyerɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ: Mmu me kumfɔ,
Sɛ wohyɛ me so a, ɛdeɛn na wonya?
Wowɔ ɔhonam mu ani anaa?
Wo nkwa nna te sɛ ɔdasani
a enti ɛsɛ sɛ wohwehwɛ me mfomsoɔ
Ɛwom sɛ wonim sɛ menni fɔ deɛ,
“Wo nsa na ɛnwonoo me na ɛbɔɔ me.
Kae sɛ wonwonoo me sɛ dɔteɛ.
Woanhwie me sɛ nufosuo
amfa wedeɛ ne honam ankata me ho
Womaa me nkwa, yii ayamyɛ kyerɛɛ me,
“Nanso yei na wode siee wʼakoma mu;
Sɛ meyɛɛ bɔne a anka wobɛhwɛ me
Na sɛ medi fɔ a, nnome nka me!
Na sɛ mepagya me ti a, wodɛɛdɛɛ me sɛ gyata,
Wode adansefoɔ foforɔ bɛtia me
“Adɛn enti na woma wɔwoo me?
Anka mamma nkwa yi mu,
Aka kakra na me nna atwam,
ansa na makɔ koransane
asase a ɛyɛ anadwo sum kabii,
